ygData.subject: Re: neglecting our families?
ygData.msgSnippet: Her older sister (38) was fired from her previous job after obtaining cash advances on her company credit card to play video slot machines (she lost over $5K).
ygData.messageBody:
Her older sister (38) was fired from her previous job after obtaining
cash advances on her company credit card to play video slot machines
(she lost over $5K). Her younger sister (31) is - my guess - about
250 lb. and frequently travels for sexual flings with men she meets
online. They both have (as does my wife) several 60+ level EQ
characters. Neither have ever been married; both still live with
their mother and stepfather. Their biological father was arrested a
couple of years ago (charges later dropped) for sexually abusing his
teenage stepdaughter.


--- In EQ_women@yahoogroups.com, "Dr. Mom" <drmom5@e...> wrote:
> Wow! 18 hours a day? I am playing 5 hours a day while two boys
> are at camp so I can tie second son's level before he gets home. I
> WISH we were on the same server.
>
> I also am glad that you didn't leave her and you guys worked
> through it. One of my degrees is in psychology and I spend a fair
> amount of online time telling men and women what their priorities
> should be. I have helped many people.
>
> Interesting that her sisters are also addicts. Must be a
> personality weakness. I wonder what %age of EQ players now are
> female?
>
> Grats on your masters! (Are you sure running isn't addictive?)
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> Menopause is when your pants get wet for a different reason.
>
> MH 2002

> Muriel Hykes aka. Drmom
